description: Seattle-based World Cup Climber Sean Bailey co-designed these pants with movement-mirroring stretch built for bouldering and dynamic moves at the crag. The Men's Canvas Pant utilizes a cotton/nylon blend with a touch of stretchy spandex to mirror your movements while complementing drop-knee and high-step moves on your favorite boulder problem. Articulated knees keep the fabric from bunching around your joints and allow you to effortlessly slip your harness on, and UPF 50+ protection keeps your skin safe from the sun. Multiple drop-in and zippered pockets keep your essential items close and easily accessible. Built with climbing in mind from a durable cotton/nylon blend fabric, these stretchy shorts are fit for the most challenging climbs—and just as suitable as an everyday staple.
name: Outdoor Research Canvas Pants, Straight Leg, 30" Inseam - Mens
